name: ICarly: Isock it to 'Em
summary: Spencer's creating a gigantic sock sculpture for his buddy Socko and needs - yep, you got it - socks! Join Carly and friends on her web Telethon to help get crazy, fun acts onstage to perform. The more points received, the more socks get donated, and the bigger a success Spencer's sock sculpture will be! Can Freddie keep his camera in focus? Can you keep Spencer and Sam out of trouble at the judges' table? Hurry! You have just 28 hours to collect enough socks in iCarly iSock it to 'Em!
